name: AvarioskillforAmazonAlexa
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room lights”
”Alexa, turn on movie mode”
”Alexa, set the dining room lights to warm white”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Avario Smart Home Skill for Amazon Alexa is meant for Avario customers who are signed up to the Avario cloud. Once this skill is enabled you can control all of your Avario Smart Home devices from any Alexa compatible device. Control your lights, activate scenes, open and close curtains, turn on and off smart switches, adjust thermostats, and much more.
